column5: When you figure it out bud...let us know!

It looks easy to convert from one to the other  ( do not need scientific calculator)
Are there 2 tickets to the fishing show if you know the answer??
I have to check it , but I'm pretty sure it depends on the thicknes of rubber
Sorry for you, but 30cm is just a tad more than than 12 inches on my ruler, no wonder you'all down there don't like the metric system, you're getting ripped off.

One millionth millionth boo is a picaboo.  WhooHoo Lady!  And fisherman, check yer ruler for shrinkage.  30 cm / 2.54 cm/in gives you 11.81 inches.  But ya, GCD is still getting shortchanged.  Nothing like Roy tho.  He should get a refund.

Ha, damm wooden ruler is warped, yer right.  Next time I'll use my other appendage.
Naw, they aren't getting ripped off, it's just the U.S/CDN exchange rate
